BODY.SCRIPT: { "@type": "LocalBusiness", "name": "Software Solutions Development Company", "url": "https://www.devrabbit.com/", "logo": "https://www.devrabbit.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/logo.png", "image": "https://www.devrabbit.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/10/logo.png", "description": "DevRabbit is the emerging leader in Startup and enterprise software solutions, with over 100+ satisfied users in US, India and other parts of the world.
